Header: “The Kid” scheduled to be released this month
Content: “The Kid” is an upcoming 2019 American semi-biographical Western action thriller film directed by Vincent D’Onofrio, from a screenplay by Andrew Lanham, and is executive produced by Carl Stubner, through Suretone Pictures. The film stars Ethan Hawke, Dane DeHaan, Jake Schur, Leila George, Chris Pratt, D’Onofrio, and Adam Baldwin. Rio is forced to go on the run across the Southwestern United States to save his sister Sara from his villainous uncle Grant Cutler. Along the way, he encounters Sheriff Pat Garrett on the hunt for the infamous outlaw Billy the Kid. Ultimately Rio must choose which type of man he is going to become, the outlaw or the man of valor, and will use the self-realization in a final act to save his sister. The Kid is scheduled to be released in the United States on 8th of this month by Lionsgate Films.
